Description

Tormas, of course, are offered as parts of many rituals, but torma rituals are often found as independent rituals in their own right.

Related Terms

gtor chog, mchod gtor ‘bul ba’i cho ga, gtor ‘bul [TBRC T1219], gtor bsngo[s] TBRC T1209.

Related Texts

A work on the different types of tormas offered to dharma protectors is TBRC W3201.

Secondary Sources

Kohn, Richard J. "An Offering of Torma." In Religions of Tibet in Practice, edited by Donald Lopez, 255-265. Princeton: Princeton University Press, 1997.
